name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 6, in Pingding Town, Huazhou, Guangdong, an old man picked up a brick from the ground and rushed towards the traffic police to protect his motorcycle. The traffic police fled after seeing this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of July 6, in Yan'an, Shaanxi, a netizen live-streamed in Phoenix Plaza to speak out for the girl who fell from a building, but the live-streaming room was banned by the platform.
https://t.co/EnJ6mFxmdD

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shaanxi Yan'an Middle School. Someone placed a row of oranges and flowers at the place where the girl fell from the building. Some students also posted posters in the toilet, accusing the teacher involved of misleading students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Due to the recent occurrence of too many incidents in Shenyang, Liaoning,
On July 6, Shenyang launched a summer security inspection. According to videos shot by netizens, the streets in Tiexi District were full of police cars that day, and the police went to every nightclub to give lectures.
A large number of netizens left comments and ridicule in the comment area. One netizen replied: Tiexi Grand Stage, you can come to fight against the disease, free little Fengtian, knife stand every day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
The entrance notice for the Shanghai World Mobile Communications Conference from June 26 to June 28:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 7, Guiping City, Guangxi. The property management of Kaiyue International Community charged unreasonable fees and occupied the common area of the owners. The owners put up banners in the community to defend their rights. During this period, the special police snatched the banners from the owners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 6, in Jieyang, Guangdong, it was reported online that an unlicensed car hit six or seven pedestrians along the way, and finally lost control and overturned with four wheels facing up. The scene was a mess. The driver fled, and there was a woman in the passenger seat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6, Putian, Fujian. The land of Dongzhu Village was expropriated, but the government has failed to solve the resettlement problem of the villagers for 19 years. Not only that, some rights-defending villagers were detained by local officials in the Xinghua Pearl Hotel in Hanjiang District. On the same day, villagers rushed to the hotel to rescue the detained villagers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 7, an explosion occurred in a factory in Zhongtang Town, Dongguan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 7, the flood situation in Linyi, Shandong. The video shows that the streets were severely flooded and the garage was flooded.
The Linyi Meteorological Observatory warned that the average cumulative precipitation from the night of the 7th to the 9th would be 140~200 mm, with local precipitation exceeding 300 mm.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6, Henan. An old man kneels outside the Xincai County Government on a hot day. The government closes the electric gate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A restaurant in Zhengzhou, Henan, put up a slogan:
